info.name: Dark Nova.org.au
info.description: A clean theme to darkify the nova.org.au website.
info.additionalInfo:
Please note that some things are not finished and may be broken. I have not tested this on firefox, I will do after the chrome build is to my liking.

--UPDATES--
12/15/15: front page [subscribe, sneak peak, infographic, videos, popular, our picks, latest topics, heading image replaced with grey color] tech & future [current articles' sections done, subscribe and tags] fixed related posts -- slightly organized code, stylish doesn't make it too easy
12/14/15: initial release



ToDo list: 
navbar (search button, text borders, more
back to top button [almost finished]
related block
subscribe block
The goal is to have each section themed separately, which would make clean code [in progress]
Another thing i'd love to do is add options. That will be mostly in the end of production.
